channel.title: Caps-Lock on XeroLinux HQ
channel.description: Recent content in Caps-Lock on XeroLinux HQ

item.title: Caps-Lock Delayer Script
item.description: What is it ? # I just discovered a niche of users who prefer using CAPS-Lock instead of Shift while typing.. Very weird, but hey.. Anyway, one of those users shared a neat little script that solves an aging issue with CAPS Delay on Linux.
